overview: Monica joined Monster Worldwide’s San Francisco office after graduating law school in 2009. She currently serves as Assistant General Counsel with primary responsibilities for the company’s online advertising contracts and media solutions agreements for the portfolio of North American websites: Military Advantage, FastWeb, Education.org, Monster.com, and the Monster Communities (formally Affinity Labs). Monica is also a Certified Information Privacy Professional (CIPP) and acts as a privacy, data security, and compliance resource within the San Francisco office.

degrees.subject: Law
degrees.institution: University of San Francisco School of Law
